thread.title: California governor bans Redskins name at public schools
thread.title_full: California governor bans Redskins name at public schools

title: California governor bans Redskins name at public schools
text: > US California governor bans Redskins name at public schools FILE - In this Feb 7, 2015, file photo, Tulare Union High School's Ashley Alcantar wears a mascot T-shirt and makes a "U" sign after scoring the correct answer in a quiz in Porterville, Calif. Four California schools will be forced to change mascots after Gov. Jerry Brown signed legislation barring public schools from using the Redskins name for sports teams. (Chieko Hara/The Porterville Recorder via AP, File) MANDATORY CREDIT
